cells.data:
# Review

Structure is preserved by movement (must anticipate movement)
D-structure does not show the actual movement, where S does, but if something is going to move it needs a place to move to
S-structure represents movement and traces

**"Seems"**

> Jane seems to like the proposal.
> It seems that Jane likes the proposal.

*Movement*: at the D-structure, things work out for theta roles, and then we invoke movement in the S-structure
